meanings.sent1: The farm had a large midden behind the barn.
meanings.sent2: The midden was overflowing with discarded items.
meanings.sent3: The raccoons thought the midden was a treasure trove of goodies.
meanings.sent4: The midden loomed like a mountain of waste in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The smell from the midden was unbearable on hot days.

meanings.definition: A place where domestic waste is deposited.
meanings.sent1: The city's midden was located outside the town for sanitation purposes.
meanings.sent2: Every household had to dispose of their trash in the communal midden.
meanings.sent3: The midden seemed to have a life of its own, swallowing up everything thrown into it.
meanings.sent4: The midden grew like a monster fed by the constant stream of garbage.
meanings.sent5: The midden attracted all sorts of pests due to the food scraps within.
